main.java

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Board
      • main.java.AI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardInterface, MasterInterface, RulesInterface

    public class AI
extends Board
    The artificial intelligence working to beat its opponents. Extends board rather than player since the methods of the board are much more valuable.
    Author:
    Matthew Coupal

      AI(int playerNumber)
